control
Class GameControler

java.lang.Object
  control.GameControler

public class GameControler
extends java.lang.Object

This class acts as the control layer between the userInterface (GameEngine, GameFrame, and GameApplet) and the domain layers (GameClient, Environment ...)

Method Detail

getEngineDimension

public java.awt.Dimension getEngineDimension()
Returns:
A Dimension object that represents the GameEngine's current dimension.

getUpdatables

public java.util.ArrayList<Updatable> getUpdatables()
Returns:
The updatables ArrayList

getRenderables

public java.util.ArrayList<Renderable> getRenderables()
Returns:
The renderables ArrayList

setUpdatables

public void setUpdatables()
This method forces the GameControler to ask the GameClient for it's current updatables and then, the GameEngine is told that it should update it's updatables.

See Also:
GameClient.getUpdatables(), tellEngineUpdatablesOutDated()

setRenderables

public void setRenderables()
This method forces the GameControler to ask the GameClient for it's current renderables and then, the GameEngine is told that it should update it's renderables.

See Also:
GameClient.getRenderables(), tellEngineRenderablesOutDated()

processKeyEvent

public void processKeyEvent(java.awt.event.KeyEvent ke)
This method is invoked by the GameEngine instance every time it receives a KeyEvent. The GameControler then checks if the event code of this KeyEvent is in the permitted controls array, and if it is, the event is passed to the GameClient instance to be processed.

Parameters:
ke - The KeyEvent that should be checked for permission before being executed by the GameClient.

processMouseEvent

public void processMouseEvent(java.awt.event.MouseEvent me)
This method is invoked by the GameEngine instance every time it receives a MouseEvent. The GameControler then checks if the event code of this MouseEvent is in the permitted controls array, and if it is, the event is passed to the GameClient instance to be processed.

Parameters:
me - The MouseEvent that should be checked for permission before being executed by the GameClient.

instanciate

public static GameControler instanciate(GameEngine gameEngine,
                                        GameClient gameClient)
This method is used to get a GameControler instance following the Single-Town model

Parameters:
gameEngine - The GameEngine instance that the GameControler will refer.
gameClient - The GameClient instance that the GameControler will refer.
Returns:
a GameControler instance
